description: [Lazarus Group](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0032) has compromised servers to stage malicious tools.(Citation: Kaspersky ThreatNeedle Feb 2021)(Citation: ClearSky Lazarus Aug 2020)(Citation: ESET Lazarus Jun 2020)(Citation: McAfee Lazarus Jul 2020)
